supermarkets.name: All Supermarkets

hours.title: NHS
hours.description: During NHS hour, a pass should be required in all stores

hours.title: Bagless shopping
hours.description: Most stores have reverted bagless shopping, particularly for online delivery

hours.title: Online delivery
hours.description: All stores are struggling to manage online delivery at the moment. Most stores are not accepting new online delivery customers.

hours.title: Restrictions
hours.description: Most stores are restricting the amount of all or specific high-demand products in a single purchase.

hours.title: Opening hours
hours.description: Some stores have reduced opening hours to mange stock replenishment and cleaning.

hours.title: Cafes and Food Counters
hours.description: All stores have closed cafes and food counters.

supermarkets.notes: The above information may not apply to all supermarkets.

hours.title: Mutal Aid Groups
hours.description: Local organising to support the most vulnerable in our communities. Find your local group.

hours.title: Local shops
hours.description: Contact your local butcher, baker and small grocery stores - they're likely to be doing home deliveries.

hours.title: Wholesalers
hours.description: Many wholesalers have switched to direct delivery. Your Mutal Aid Group may have details of some in your area.

hours.title: Help is coming
hours.description: The 'Extermely Vulnerable' list is designed to help those most in need get the food, medication and supplies they require. There have been hundreds of thousands of volunteers to help out.

hours.title: NHS and social care workers
hours.description: Monday to Saturday, with NHS ID from 07.30 to 08.00

hours.title: Elderly, Disabled and Carers
hours.description: Monday, Wednesday and Friday, 08.00 to 09.00

hours.title: Online delivery
hours.description:
Prioritised online delivery slots for elderly, disabled and vulnerable customers.
  • Call 0800 328 1700.
  • They will be contacting all existing customers on the NHS 'Extremely Vulnerable' list.

generalHours.times: Normal opening hours - Check your local branch

hours.title: NHS
hours.description: Sunday, before opening, browsing hour for NHS workers.

hours.title: Elderly and Most Vulnerable
hours.description: 9 - 10am - Monday, Wednesday and Friday (Not Dedicated as after shop opening)

supermarkets.name: Waitrose

hours.title: NHS Workers
hours.description: Daily essentials kept aside, priority treatment at checkout

hours.title: Elderly and vulnerable shoppers, as well as those who look after them
hours.description: First opening hour in all supermarkets

supermarkets.generalHoursNote: Normal opening, use branch finder to check local opening
supermarkets.notes: Limited customer numbers in store, 2 meter rule marshals, staff protection.

supermarkets.name: Marks and Spencer

hours.title: NHS
hours.description: Tuesday and Friday for the first hour

hours.title: Elderly and Most Vulnerable
hours.description: Monday and Thursday for the first hour

hours.title: Deliveroo
hours.description: Delivering some BP M&S products through Deliveroo

supermarkets.generalHoursNote: Normal opening, use branch finder to check local opening

supermarkets.name: Asda

hours.title: NHS
hours.description: Larger stores every Monday, Wednesday and Friday from 8am to 9am.

hours.title: Elderly and Most Vulnerable
hours.description: No ongoing commitment.

supermarkets.generalHoursNote: Store opening hours have been changed, use branch finder
supermarkets.notes: Reduced opening times in stores, see website.

supermarkets.name: Morrisons

hours.title: NHS
hours.description: 7am to 8am, Monday to Saturday

hours.title: Elderly and Most Vulnerable
hours.description: No ongoing commitment.

hours.title: Food boxes - Delivery
hours.description: Vegetarian or Meat, essentials box. Delivery slots limited, available from Morrison's website.

hours.title: Amazon Prime Now
hours.description: Next day delivery is still available on some items from Morrisons on Amazon Prime Now.

supermarkets.generalHoursNote: Normal opening, use branch finder to check local opening
supermarkets.notes: Installing protective screens. Opening hours 8-8 during week.

supermarkets.name: Co-Op

hours.title: NHS
hours.description: 8–9am Monday to Saturday, and 10– 11am on Sundays (Not dedicated)

hours.title: Those at higher risk and the people who care for them
hours.description: 8–9am Monday to Saturday, and 10– 11am on Sundays (Not dedicated)

hours.title: Online Orders
hours.description: No priority, but orders limited to 20 items

supermarkets.notes: They say: "Our colleagues will be prioritising and caring for vulnerable customers."

supermarkets.name: Iceland

hours.title: NHS
hours.description: Final hour of trading, Monday - Saturday (with ID)

hours.title: Elderly and vulnerable
hours.description: First hour of trading, Monday - Saturday

supermarkets.generalHoursNote: Some stores have reduced hours, use branch finder

supermarkets.name: Ocado

hours.title: NHS, Elderly and Most Vulnerable
hours.description: No specific commitment for priority slots

hours.title: Online Delivery
hours.description: Ocado are prioritising existing smart pass customers, with 'booking slots'. One booking allowed, every seven days.

supermarkets.notes: Ocado have a virtual queue that averages 4 hours in the day. Slots are three weeks ahead.

supermarkets.name: Lidl

hours.title: All Customers
hours.description: No commitment to priority or early opening

supermarkets.generalHoursNote: Opening hours may have changed, use branch finder

supermarkets.name: Aldi

hours.title: NHS, Police or Fire Service
hours.description: Sundays, 09:30 - 10am, priority access to checkouts at 10am

supermarkets.generalHoursNote: Reduced opening times, use branch finder
